# JSON Cleaner
Quick comment cleaner for Node.JS!

### Installation

```shell
$ npm install json-cleaner
```

### Description

v1.0.0
Working with comments with `//` and `/* */` (and variations).

## Quick Usage

**sample.js**
```javascript
var jsonCleaner = require('json-cleaner');

var someJson = jsonCleaner.clean(someJson);
```
